quote: In my world death will come chasing. In your world it will start whispering in your ear to destroy yourself. I know this because it started whispering to me when I was in the detention center.
quote_letters: IN MY WORLD DEATH WILL COME CHASING IN YOUR WORLD IT WILL START WHISPERING IN YOUR EAR TO DESTROY YOURSELF I KNOW THIS BECAUSE IT STARTED WHISPERING TO ME WHEN I WAS IN THE DETENTION CENTER
